Plot: An assassin, Drake, wakes up after being badly beaten after killing a man. His torturer is found in an adjacent room beating Drake's girlfriend, Christine, but is stopped by Drake before he...
Title: Blood Ties
Writer: Amanda Griswold (contributing writer), Ryan Griswold (screenplay), Larry Thompson (story)
